horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: When the week starts, there will be a cluster of planets will be in your tenth house of Capricorn, so the midheaven is under heavy planetary influence. These planets will aspect your family front also, so your career and family will be having significant events. The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus are moving through the tenth house, so there will be events like getting new opportunities, important talks with your managers and colleagues, and you will be a bit tensed about your career. If you are already going through a tough time in your job, then this planetary influence can add stress, so you need to manage your duties well.

This is a golden opportunity for job seekers, as they will get some interview calls too, and they should keep on applying for new jobs for the next thirty plus days. Those who work in admin, sports, creativity and communication will have the closest opportunities to get a new job. These planets will aspect the fourth house, so at home also you will have to take up additional responsibilities at home. You will have responsibilities connected with elders at home, real estate deals, renovation and work from home opportunities too.

On the weekend Moon will square Pluto in Aquarius, so this day is important for your elder siblings, and those who want to join new organisations as well. However, you need to pick and choose your battles wisely, otherwise there will be unwanted clashes with your teammates of elder siblings too. Mars is aspecting your sign, so Aries rising, Moon and Sun signs will have a lot of things happening in their personal life. Still, Mars is your ruler, so the ruling planet will always fight for you and the good news is that, you will overcome all the struggles even if you take some time.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: For Taurus rising, Sun and Moon signs, this week is very important for getting some messages from the foreign lands. There will be collaborations, and communications from people from the foreign lands. The ninth house is loaded with multiple planets, so you will have the closest opportunities for sudden travel like going for a study program, or for a pilgrimage, vacation or a business purpose too. You will also enrol for a study program, and you will get some recognition for your work done. Fatherly figures, and mentors will have a very important conversation with you.

Mars will aspect the twelfth house, so this is an assurance regarding getting an update from the foreign lands. This is a complex time as Mars is a natural malefic and the twelfth house indicates sleep, so you will have some sleep disorders, like getting less sleep or having some complex dreams. These dreams will be highly intuitive, and they will give some signals about the future. Please stay away from controversial issues, otherwise there will be arguments, and definitely don’t entertain any complex people around you. At home, you will have some events like renovation, relocation or family function.

During the weekend, Moon will aspect Pluto in Aquarius, so this day will be very important for your career. So, during this day will have some important duties which needs mental calculation. There will be some updates regarding your existing projects too. Altogether, this is a very busy week, where you have to run around a lot. There will be a lot of communication, so you will be constantly using your electronic devices, and you will have a lot of online or offline meetings too. Your siblings and neighbouring community also will have big role in your life during this week.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: For Gemini rising, Sun, and Moon your finances will be of utmost importance as the eighth house is loaded with multiple planets, and this placement is a complex one. The good thing is Venus and Mercury, two benefics are with Sun and Mars, so your finances will get managed, but the flow of this week will be gravitating towards financial issues, as the eighth house indicates instability. You will have to manage your finances, as there will be some emergency situation where you have to find some money. There will be some situation where you have to make some financial adjustments but make sure you follow the advice of a financial consultant.

These planets will aspect the second house, so there will be a lot of communications about finances, investment and new courses. The second house indicates speech also, so your speech will be very complex, and people around you may find it difficult to understand that. There are chances to get some public speaking opportunities too, so use these opportunities wisely. New job opportunities can also come up in fulltime, part time or freelance mode too.

Mars will aspect the eleventh house, so you will have many opportunities to interact people from the foreign lands. There are chances for joining new team or you will get some new friends during this transit. However, Mars is a natural malefic so, there are chances for you to argue with your team mates and friends, so make sure you think twice before you speak. This is a good time to set some goals for your professional life, and you will automatically think about such things. The eleventh house also indicates long term plans, gains, and advanced technology, so you will be doing something regarding these three.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: For Cancer, Sun, Moon and rising signs, personal and professional relationships will be highly important as the Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus are in the earth sign of Capricorn. This planetary influence will directly reflect on your personal and business relationship. A cluster of planets in one house has its own challenges and opportunities too, so you need to handle the relationships wisely. This is a crucial transit for business owners as they will have some issues with their business partners, but Venus will support them to solve the issues.

You will be attending social gatherings, and meet new people, but make sure you don’t trust anyone blindly despite known or unknown people. This is a complex time if you are going through any relationship issues as the situation can get aggravated during this time. This is a very sensitive situation for new business ventures, as the Sun is in the its house of debilitation, so make sure you don’t offend anyone while signing the contract. Please make sure you read all the details carefully, and take expert opinion as well. There will be social gatherings like weddings, engagement or business meet too.

Mars will aspect the tenth house, so you will somehow want to prove yourself at your work. Please make sure you don’t fight for your rights without completing your duties. This is a very important time for those who work in sports, admin and armed forces will have more responsibilities. Moon will square Pluto in Aquarius, which will impact the financial matters, so you will have some financial gains through difficulties. This square aspect indicates obstacles, so please avoid any kind of lending or borrowing during the weekend. Instead, this is a very good day to plan long term for your career and finances too.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: The time is moving fast and the we have reached the second week of this new year, which is a very surprising fact. During this week, there will be a cluster of planets in the sixth house, so you will have to take up more responsibilities at work, as the sixth house indicates work, debts, diseases and enemies. Even though this is a complex transit, you will be the winner as the Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus will help you to solve the issues. New job opportunities can come up, so, if you are a job seeker, then you will have such opportunities.

There will be some arguments at work, so stay away from any kind of workplace gossips or politics, as you will not be able to handle the pressure. Your colleagues will be very demanding, and they will expect more work quality from you, so don’t give anyone the room to complain. Additionally, the lower abdomen will also be sensitive, so you need to be careful with your diet. Please try to consume organic diet which doesn’t cause any acid reflux. The Sun, and Mars are fiery planets and when they are in the sixth house, acidity related issue can easily happen.

Mars will aspect the ninth house, so, there will be projects from the foreign lands, and you will also get some foreign collaborations as well. Mars and other planets will also aspect the twelfth house, the foreign collaborations and getting some updates about your foreign settlement. On the weekend Moon will square Pluto in Aquarius, so you will have some meetings during this day. It can be like a business meet where you discuss the plan to start a new business, or a fun party as well.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content:
You are going through a very busy time in your life, especially if you are a businessman or trying to have own business. The second week of January will bring a lot of focus on your creative abilities, so those who work in such domain will also have more work. During this week, despite you being rising, Sun or Moon, will try to promote your skills, and people will accept your talents as well. If you are a parent, you will have lot more responsibilities with your children, and they will demand your attention too
If you are a single, there will be plenty of opportunities to meet with likeminded people, but this is not the time to start a new relationship. You will also go for social gatherings, so this week will be very eventful. All these planets will aspect the eleventh house, so you will surely get new friends or team collaborations. Online and offline communications will be plenty, and you will also attend a lot of team meetings for setting up some goals. During this week, you will be working hard to increase your profits as well.

Mars will aspect the eighth house, which is a reflag for your financial matters as Mars itself is the planet for financial liabilities. You will work for some private projects which includes research and analysis, and it can also be connected to finances as well. There will be some complex financial transactions, but make sure they are legal and transparent too. During this week, you will also try to restructure your tax, PF and insurance related plans too. The Moon will square Pluto in Aquarius which will bring small tasks which are complex. The square is a harsh aspect and it can bring temporary abdominal issues as well, so your health is also important.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: We have reached the second week of January, which will be a surprise for you, so it’s evident that time is running fast. This is a very important week for your family matters as a cluster of planets will be in the fourth house, which shows, you have to take up a lot of responsibilities at home. It can be taking up family responsibilities, multiple real estate deals, renovation or other things like elderly care as well. When multiple planets are in one house, definitely, you will be having some stress as well.

Mars will aspect the seventh house, so this is a very important time for those who are in a relationship. Mars is a separative planet, so you will have to be careful with your relationships. New people may come into your life, but this is not the time to entertain new people. Please make sure you take enough time to understand each other. There are chances for foreign collaborations, public meetings and parties, as the social sector is active by this transit. Moon will aspect Pluto inn Aquarius, and this also showing the possibilities in having a new relationship.

These planets will aspect the tenth house , so at work also you will have some restrictions, as there will be multiple jobs, and responsibilities, which are not easy. Your managers will ask you to take up important tasks, which will be a bit hard. Unemployed Libra Sun, Moon and rising natives will have the closest time to find a new job, which will be a very good turning point in your life. Those who work in arts, sports and admin also will have such opportunities too. Altogether, this week is a bit hard for you, but it is the part of the life, and the show must go on.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: The second week of January will not have any new developments, as every event will move forward as the continuation of the last week. The Sun, Mars, Venus and Mercury were in the third house, and this week also they will be in the third house making you busier, as the third house indicates multitasking. The third house indicates various communication, so you will have major projects from writing, teaching, preaching and counselling. During this week, you will also try to set up new business, but make sure you don’t take any risk.

Travelling will be another major feature of this week, as the third house indicates short travels, but there are chances for long trips also. You will be working hard to learn new things, so online and offline learning and self-learning also will be the part of this transit. There will be some unrest due to multiple tasks, so you need to make a correct plan so that you can follow them to have a disciplined life. Siblings, neighbours and people in your community will be the part of your life, and you will take part in some events with them.

Mars will aspect sixth house, so you will have to follow a strict diet as well, as Mars is a fiery planet, and it will increase acidity. Don’t go for junk diet, otherwise you will have a lot of inconvenience due to this. There are chances for some arguments at workplace, and you should control your speech, otherwise it will bring quarrels. Moon will have an aspect to Pluto in Aquarius, which is a complex aspect, so you need to take care of your family matters seriously as there will be showing some serious responsibilities at home.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: Your financial matters are very important as a cluster of planets are moving through the earth sign of Capricorn. For Sagittarius, Sun, Moon and rising, planets are in the second house of finances. The Sun and Mars are fiery planets, so you will have to spend money, but at the same time, Venus and Mercury are also there, so you will get some money as well. You will also get some projects like a full time job, freelance or part time mode as well. Those who work in public speaking and coaching will also get such opportunities.

These planets will aspect the eighth house, and this house indicates ups and downs, The planets will bring some concerns regarding loans and repayment, so you need to manage your money properly. This is a very sensitive situation, so please don’t make any aggressive spending too. Relationships, despite personal and professional will go through some stress, as multiple planets will bring different issues, so you need to be truthful and diplomatic in the relationships. You will also be depending on spiritual matters to strengthen yourself during this week.

Mars will aspect the fifth house, so you will have an eye on investing in huge projects which involves a lot of money, but make sure you don’t do that. Your creative ideas will get appreciated but make sure your business ideas are practical. This is a very good time to spend time with your friends and children around you, as they will appreciate your presence. You will also take part in some social gathering and meet new people. During the weekend, Moon will make a square to Pluto, which is in Aquarius, so you will have a lot of short trips, and small tasks too.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: The second week of January will be the continuation of the last week, as the planets will be in the same house just like the last week. This is the solar return time for Capricorn Sun natives so the planetary transits will be impacting them more than Capricorn Moon and rising signs. This is the time for correction and discipline, as the Sun is showing you the need of self-reliance. You will be going through some important events in your life, which will change your life in the coming days.

You will try to change your appearance, and image, so you may even go through an image makeover. People will look at you in a new perspective, which will of a responsible person. All these planets will aspect the seventh house of relationships, so there will be new jo opportunities, or business associations too. You will be looking for new groups so that you can expand your network as well. You will be able to get some foreign collaborations as well, and you will take some time to get things done, so keep on working on them.

During the weekend Moon will square Pluto , which will impact your finances, and the square aspect is not a good one. So, you need to be very careful with your money matters, as there will be expenses too. Mars will aspect the fourth house, so, there are chances for some unrest at home, so you need to manage very well. You will think about taking part in some family functions, and you may even conduct them. Please take care of the elders at home, as Mars aspect shows too much of stress for them, and you need to support them.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: The second week of January will be just like the continuation of the first week, as Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus will be in the twelfth house. This is a challenging time for you, but these planets are making a cosmic reset so that you can recharge your batteries when the Sun moves into the first house. During this week, you will be spending time in solving some of your personal problems, and that would not be easy. You will be spending time in prayer, and other spiritual practices, which can strengthen you emotionally and physically.

These planets will aspect the sixth house, so there will be a lot of work related stress as well. You will be looking for a new job or a new opportunity, but that will come to you after a lot of effort. This is a complex time for those who work in teaching, counting, HR, admin or armed forces, so they have to be very alert. There will be some issues at workplace, so anticipate some complexities, otherwise you will be distracted when these events come up.

Moon will aspect Pluto in your sign, and this is a complex aspect though. A situation involving your identity, role or personal authority will escalate quickly and reach a point of confrontation or resolution. Mars will be aspecting the third house, so you will have short as well as long trips, which can be very tiring too. There are chances for last minute cancellation of these travels as well. You and siblings will have a discussion about some family event, and you will even be very aggressive in these discussions. Please make sure you don’t offend anyone, otherwise this week will be full of chaos.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting January 4
content: The transit Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus are moving through the eleventh house, so you will have some plans for your future. The eleventh house indicates networks and group activities, so you will have a lot of interactions with your friends, colleagues, or community groups. These interactions will lead to concrete decisions, or outcomes, which can give you a positive outlook about your future. Team meetings can happen online or offline too. You will get new friends, and new long term projects in the next thirty days.

These planets will aspect the fifth house of creativity, so this transit will produce visible developments in creativity, children, and love life. Romantic situation will move forwards, and single Pisces Sun, Moon and rising signs can expect dating, or meet ups. Creative projects will come up and they will project through launches, performances, promotions, or completed work will gain attention. Parents will have more activities with children, and couples trying to get a child will get some updates about their treatment too. Your social life will improve and that is assured in the next thirty plus days.

Moon will aspect Pluto in Aquarius and Mars will aspect the second house, both are complex aspects so your emotional self is very important, so don’t get into any kind of activities which can ruin your peace and happiness. Mars will aspect the second house, so you will have to spend more for yourself and your family. There will be more opportunities for new job, part time or fulltime job also. During this time, you will be trying maintain good bank balance, but there will be sudden expenses as well.
